Articles.Content:
> 
> 6PM GMT or riot

I support this
started at page 50ish, now at 105....
The forum is slowly breaking, there is no "Current Users" tab, there is no "Currently Viewing" on the forum.
Come on, I'm burning my phone checking and re-checking the forum and Twitter while at home, my pc is in download mode...

> 
> I am detecting a slight elevation of anticipation in the community. Is something interesting happening today?

Yes. SpaceX launch.

> 
> At this rate, we may well get double the posts of the 0.24 hype thread. That would be impressive.

wasn't the .24 the biggest hype thread evah?
@KSP twitter just re-tweeted @Maxmaps post about the website going online and the release so i think it will be on the hour!

> 
> It was this strange concept called a "joke". Seriously, have a bit of fun!

Ok nvm that. I'm just getting angry with all those 502's in main forum page. Yeah I know steam auto update, mass hype, and prolly mass download fail after release. That makes me really sad when I think of it. Happycat has run out of happy...
I'm waiting for 1.0. This is just crazy. I should be doing everything else. Oh well KSP is probably the best game I've played.

Dear Squad, we are sorry for burning down the servers.....

But realy, post some statistics. I'd love to see the damage we delt
6PM when Steam updates so....yeah (as with other releases....)
go go go go go gooooooooooooo

> 
> yes. Spacex launch.

lelelelellelelelelelelel

> 
> Well, I could remove the hypelithium crystals and let the hype and anti-hype annihilate directly, that might push us over hype factor 13.. ..for a whole nanosecond, as a cloud of expanding gas. Go or no go on that?

No no no no,you've got it all wrong! You have to put the LFE-SPRT on standby first THEN remove the hypelithium crystals! You trying to get us all killed?!

> 
> Wait, that's... EXACTLY-HOW IT WORKS

You've finally cracked it!

> 
> The forum is slowly breaking, there is no "Current Users" tab, there is no "Currently Viewing" on the forum.

Admins are removing nonessential functions so the hype may flow.

We're HYPEing non-stop!

I just saw the engineer throw the brake handle out the window!

> 
> I just came back from dinner and the thread has around 50 more pages! Whoa.

You eat *really* fast.
voting for noon in mexico time (in 10 minutes)

> 
> No no no no,you've got it all wrong! You have to put the LFE-SPRT on standby first THEN remove the hypelithium crystals! You trying to get us all killed?!

Yes...

Wait.
Grr. The mind is strong but the flesh is weak. I'm going to have to go get dinner. There better be a release once I'm back.

> 
> 6PM GMT or riot

ANd riot.. AND. It cannot be stopped now, we're past the point of no return~

> 
> wasn't the .24 the biggest hype thread evah?

Indeed it was until today. We shattered it and we are still trucking

> 
> Yes. SpaceX launch.

Wait, what? Screw this, I'm off to watch SpaceX!
